website_summaries.verdict: One of the smallest packs of mass gainer you can buy for a quick and easy snack.
pros: Uses a higher count of calories per serving than other mass gainer options
Comes in several flavors such as banana, chocolate, and peanut butter
Blends well with fruits, nuts, and other foods
cons: Added flavors tend to overpower other ingredients and flavors

customer_reviews.title: Already seeing great results for my under weight autistic son
customer_reviews.text: Already seeing great results for my under weight autistic son. These photos are results in just 3 weeks on serious Mass.
customer_reviews.author: brian edmonson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the gains!
customer_reviews.text: In 5 weeks I went from 103lbs to 115lbs (I'm 5'1) all I have been doing is weight training and making sure I'm eating in a surplus and drinking my protien shakes post workout. I will say it was making me super bloated so I cut it to just 1 scoop I add half a banana, 1 scoop of peanut butter, and a splash of vanilla almond milk. The taste is absolutely amazing. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: inthavong

customer_reviews.title: This product is dangerous and has an overdose of many vitamins over their daily recommended values.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when using this product. After one week, my liver enzymes were elevated extremely high and caused me to have mild fatty liver. I would not recommend this product as my doctor informed me that the high levels of vitamins are not a healthy dose as well as the laundry list of other unhealthy ingredients in this product. Using this product can cause serious damage to your body.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: And it tastes WONDERFUL. I almost feel like I'm cheating
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten thicker than a snicker. So much mass. And it tastes WONDERFUL. I almost feel like I'm cheating. It's great. I'm on my third tub 😩
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Best For GAINING Mass
customer_reviews.text: Firstly , if you are looking for a protein powder that will help you gain LEAN mass, then stop reading right now and look elsewhere. This protein powder is for people like myself who have trouble gaining weight and want to put on some muscle/mass. You also need to make sure you are acut ally working out, if not you'll just gain fat. This stuff is a miracle for skinny guys like me, I've gained 5 -10 lbs in the last few months and that's A LOT for me and has never happen before. The taste is also the best I've ever had, the chocolate is my personal favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great but Not Cost Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This gigantic container is only supposed to last you about a week. You'll pay about $100 a month to use this stuff if you follow the instructions. It tastes fine and goes down easy and I'd gladly take it regularly if one of these gigantic containers lasted a month. No way I can justify dropping $1,200 a year on chocolate shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Mel

customer_reviews.title: Unless you love drinking Pepto Bismol, stay away from Strawberry flavor
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE flavor!!! Only got the Strawberry flavor but if you like the flavor of strawberry cough syrup, or enjoy downing about four bottles of pepto bismol, then you Do Not want to get the strawberry flavor. Tried it with water and with milk and big time no bueno!!! The only reason I gave it a second star was because it actually does pack a whole lot of calories for weight gaining and the other flavors might be better. But the strawberry flavor...Yuck. Don't make my mistake by not reading all the reviews first.
customer_reviews.author: gheetz

customer_reviews.title: Exited to try this out...
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to give it 4 stars and take it from here since it's my first time trying this powder. Alright, first impression: That is a serious big bag full of goodies, loved it. Great for the bucks. Also, can anybody tell me I'm doing this right: The directions say: 24 oz of water on a blender with two scoops. Am I reading this right or?... This is a big ass scoop for 24 oz of water, look at the blender, I threw in there two bottles of water plus one scoop. That consistency is very thick, uuugh. I'm confused..... Is this right, can anybody please tell me. o_O
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Velázquez

customer_reviews.title: Got me through radiation treatments
customer_reviews.text: Needed a supplement to get me through head & neck radiation treatments when I could no longer eat solid foods. Made high calorie smoothies out of it. Very good flavor. Did both vanilla & chocolate but preferred vanilla because it gave more flexibility with flavors (added flavored yogurt and chocolate syrup to give me options on taste). Very good flavor. Tried another brand from a local nutrition store. This was much better tasting. Helped me to keep my weight on..
customer_reviews.author: Charn

customer_reviews.title: Good For Weight Gain
customer_reviews.text: My husband gained 15 lbs in about 4 weeks drinking this product. He was underweight so this was really helpful for him to get in the calories he needed. The flavor of the Vanilla is good.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Bolin

customer_reviews.title: amazing product so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17 year old son after his Doctor said he was extremely under weight. (5' 6" 110 lbs) He has been taking it now for about 12 weeks and is seeing great results. I make him a shake every night after his workouts (1 scoop of powder with 12 oz. of non fat milk and I add 1/2 a cup of peanut butter to his shake. He is currently at about 135 lbs and he feels amazing. I highly recommend this product to anybody with a busy schedule having a hard time consuming enough calories. here is a before and after picture.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: In my specific case - health issues
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong this is my point of view only , but true story - what happened is that I started consuming this, I loved the taste , but I've started urinating some crystals so I went to the doctor, he made some tests and told me I have kidney stones. I am not saying that it was just because of this, but my diet have always been the same and the timing when I started seeing crystals in my urine was a few weeks after I started using this product. So I stopped using this and will not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lobenstein

customer_reviews.title: Maltodextrin is not a good carb
customer_reviews.text: Maltodextrin is horrible. It's the primary carbohydrate in this mix-and it's cheap. It's higher on the glycemic index than table sugar. I bough this bag not realizing that it was the first ingredient in the mix. I'm throwing this bag out. Eat clean food with high carbs if that's what you need. Yeah harder to swallow in mass if you need it quickly but this trash will wreck your body. Just skip it altogether. This is the stuff that gives the supplement industry a bad name.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really helps get me through those long days at the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A SIGNIFICANT ADVANTAGE OVER THE REST!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this long enough to chart any significant progress — but I can attest to how great it actually it tastes! I HATE the taste 99.9% of powders! No matter what, I have not been able to get past that artificially foul and chalky taste. But as a previous poster had mentioned, it does taste like a Wendy’s Frosty. Okay, maybe not that great — but better than the rest!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight gain
customer_reviews.text: Literally helping me gain weight. I used only 1 scoop a day and don’t have time to eat much and still managed to gain 3 pounds in a week. I also don’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: Ss_88

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product as I have many times from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as I have many times from both amazon and vitamin stores. This time, I received my order from Amazon and put the bag on my counter. After a week or so went by, I lifted the bag and noticed that the white residue on the bottom of the bag took the finish right off my newer granite counter top. Imagine if we ingested the chemical on the bottom of the bag with the supplement!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry I

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Getting these extra calories, protein & carbs is really helping. I don't eat breakfast at all & hardly any lunch so I'll drink 1 scoop mixed with 2% milk in place of those meals (2 scoops/1 serving per day). I'm on my 6th container having 1 serving per day & went from 179-181 lbs to 188-191 lbs (6'00") in less than a month and a half. The chocolate peanut butter is by far the best flavor, especially if you add a Tbsp of peanut butter to it. It's also definitely helping with building muscle combined with lifting. Surprisingly fast results, great taste, a little high on the sugar, but great product.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly it worked for me !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would gain weight in quick time.In 4 weeks I almost gained 9 pounds.I am buying this again for few more pounds gain. Although the strawberry flavor is not the best one but better than the rest I guess.
customer_reviews.author: RamsInd

customer_reviews.title: love it! im a girl i was scared id ...
customer_reviews.text: gained about 20 pound , love it! im a girl i was scared id get big but its perfect i did 1 scoop a serving instead of 2 and only drank it mayb once twice a week, whenever i didnt have time to eat. if you stop working out while taking this like i did lol you will slowly see chub but if you hit the gym for a lil you'll be good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight gain
customer_reviews.text: I burn a lot of calories at a recent job that has me going up and down stairs all day which is bad since I already have a fast metabolism. I'm 5'7 and dropped to 126 from 142. 2 months after using this product on a daily basis, I'm back to my normal weight. I plan to continue using this product to reach my goal of 160. Highly recommended for those who have trouble maintaining a healthy weight
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTE
customer_reviews.text: My husband has cancer and has lost a lot of weight, so I ordered this for him. We mix it with milk for more calories. Although he has not gained much weight......he has not lost any more. We have just placed our third order, and hope that once he is off chemo, he will start to gain his weight back. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: southern belle

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a skinny guy at 140 pounds and had to eat 3000 calories a day to gain weight.. Never could keep on the weight. Started drinking this 2-3 times a day. Now I'm 170, and built great muscle mass. If you're a skinny guy like me and wanna build muscle this is the way to go. PS the chocolate peanutbutter actually tasks good. The plan chocolate one is very chalky.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - High blood pressure.
customer_reviews.text: This may work for some, but in my case I had heart flutters at night almost like a sugar overdose after a week of this I stopped it. Good luck taking this an hour before bed and then trying to sleep with a pounding heartbeat. I am not new to products like this, but typically tend to buy the more costly natural gainers. With all the reviews I thought I would give this a shot, but in the end it's not for me. I will say I have used Universal Nutrition Real Gains for years and had no adverse affects like I experienced with this product .
customer_reviews.author: l!m!t

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best protein powder I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different protein powders and supplements over the years, and this is the best one so far! A full serving offers higher sane amounts--and a wider variety--of vitamins and minerals than the men's multivitamin I used to buy. The flavor is good when mixing with water...although it comes out very thin. However, when you mix it with milk--it suddenly becomes one of the best milkshakes you have never known about(unless you already had it before)! When I say milkshake, it *literally* tastes like a milkshake--it is that good. Combine with the fact that its freaking healthy, and I'm sold for life...or until they change the formula(for whatever reason...because companies *love* doing that).
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: When I tell you this thing work...it really does. I am 5' 5. have been 97lbs all my life and I went up to 115lbs in 5wks. For bfast i would have and egg sandwich with my shake 4hrs later I'd stop by McDonald for lunch (small milkshake with nuggets & fries) Dinner (rice & some form of meat) with shake. I took something to open my appetite (sss tonic or apetamin).
customer_reviews.author: ProblemChild

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: Could rate it more than 1 star if I hadn't use the one I used before (MusclePharm Combat XL Mass-Gainer Powder). Since that was out of stock I tried this one (OPTIMUM NUTRITION Serious Mass Weight Gainer Protein Powder, Vanilla, 12 Pound) and it tastes like cheap wheat flour (even with Milk). I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Formula change *__*
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for over 4 years. They just recently changed the look and formula and added creatine which was 100% unnecessary. Another example of trying to fix something that wasn’t broken. The new formula tastes much sweeter and leaves a nasty taste in the mouth. And the added creatine is an unwelcome addition for anyone who supplements their own. I used to buy one once a month and now Optimum Nutrition just lost a 4 year customer. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kolt Garber

customer_reviews.title: I definitely love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love this protein powder. The way I gained weight happened really fast, about 40 pounds in 2 months and this product helped tremendously. I have to say I hated the vanilla flavor though lol. But I loved the chocolate! Remember to work out as well because otherwise you'll start getting fat around your stomach which is what happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J

customer_reviews.title: All the gains
customer_reviews.text: Been purchasing this product for quite a while now. Gains have been made using this product and will continue ordering it. The tastes are actually pretty good and mixes well. The only clumps I get is when it bunches up near the spout. If you split the servings however it does not happen as much since the scoop size is almost equivalent to a garden shovel. All and all its a great product, and offers a lot more than the standard protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: gbark3

customer_reviews.title: Recommend if trying to gain weight...
customer_reviews.text: As an underweight person, this is really great for gaining weight when you can't quite eat enough calories in the day. In the previous four years I've lost 5 pounds from my already low weight because I wasn't getting enough calories in my usual diet. I needed desperately to gain weight because I couldn't get myself to eat more food as I wasn't used to it and the fact I have a very busy schedule. This gainer the past three months has helped me gain ten pounds at two scoops a day for five days per week with some low intense strength training. The vanilla flavour tastes great. I look forward to tasting the other flavours.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: JUST DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is on point. Not too chocolaty and not grainy or pasty. I follow the directions except I add my favorite vanilla ice cream, spoon of peanut butter and half of a banana and a few ice cubes. Pulse this in my blender ther hit smoothie. Delish! My start weight was 108 lbs. In a week, no kidding, I was kissing 114lbs. I have always been a small person at 5'0. I have to say that the T's and A's are baaaaack! Would I recommend? ABSOLUTELY! I'm looking GOOOD! 5 more pounds worked into thr right places and I'm all good
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is good and mixes well. Cost efficient
customer_reviews.text: Good product! ive been through 3 6lbs tubs already. Tried Banana and Vanilla, both great flavors that are NOT over powering flavor. I mix my shakes with fruits and soy milk, PB and other things. add a banana and it tastes great. easy to cover up artifical flavor with real flavor. i bought the banana cream CASEIN from ONS, and the flavor is so strong it makes me wanna hurl after drinking half of it even with in a mix. This is cost efficent and helps the skinny man add 1000+ calories in one meal. Shiping took longer then normal, but i think that is Fedexs fault.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla has orange flecks and different taste
customer_reviews.text: We have been ordering this brand for quite a while. The large bag came in and when my son makes it and now turns orange in color. Not the normal off one color of vanilla. Looking inside I could see that they were little granules that were darker than the rest of the vanilla powder. They are orange in color. Suffice to say will be not using the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Slightly misleading...
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a protein powder that was going to help me put on some weight. I was drawn to this, because it boosts a high caloric intake. Wonderful. Come to find out their scoop is literally 3x the size of a normal scoop! I literally died laughing when I dug that thing out. I could not fathom consuming that much powder every day. Fortunately, I saved my old scoop and opted for 2 reg scoops of this stuff. I've noticed unwanted difference in my face/neck, midsection and facial acne since consuming this. It tastes absolutely fine. I'll definitely be finishing the product. May give Naked Mass a try once finished.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: MADE ME MOODY. I gained around 15 pounds in 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: This product weirdly made me feel grumpy, the flavor is decent but nothing special, I had to mix fruits, oatmeal, and almond butter. When I drank the 2 scoops I was gaining just belly fat. I changed it to 1 scoop and the results improved. This is a good product espically for its price but I began caring more about what I consume. Personally i won't ever buy this again and I'll be switching to NAKED Mass. And if that doesnt work then I guess the Pro Gainer..... I disliked the ingredients in this one, espically the calories.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Campos

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for my health
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a health problem that caused me to lose a dangerous amount of weight. This mass gainer has been absolutely amazing with helping me to get my weight crawling back up just a bit faster than normal. The chocolate flavor was a great surprise, really tasting like chocolate! When I added that with a drop of chocolate syrup and a tablespoon of peanut butter in milk, it tasted like those peanut butter M&Ms. Everyone has different needs for mass gainer, so this was a great surprise for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight gain with cancer or very ill patients !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and great tasting ! Mix in my vitamix with any juice and some ice! Husband with cancer FINALLY started aging weight and has a lot of energy!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J Eckert

customer_reviews.title: but i now prefer the chocolate flavors much better, a lot easier to go down
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does, i was able to gain 20 lbs supplementing with this. It can be intense at the beginning but its all about finding the right balance, never do a full dose at once. Just do 2 half doses theoughout the day, sometimes i just do half a dose in one day since it is so heavy. I started out w vanilla, but i now prefer the chocolate flavors much better, a lot easier to go down, i like to add banana and peanut butter to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob D

customer_reviews.title: I'VE HAD 25 GAINED POUNDS OF SUCCESS !!!
customer_reviews.text: OK....My first glass was nasty..Thats only because its a nutrition supplement. Its gonna taste a bit nasty. I am now on my third container and i have went from 143 to 170 in 3 months. I have 1 to 2 shakes a day. I use 1/2 whole milk and then vanilla ice cream. I blend the milk and ice cream together, then add the mass gainer. Its an acquired taste. But it really is just fine now. Ive had no problems since starting this.. I only use Vanilla, ive tried other flavors and there gross....Vanilla with the milk and ice cream is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Brown of Heber

customer_reviews.title: Unhealthy Invrediants. Thrown out
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good weight gainer untill the aspertate (horrible, poisonous, toxic,) ingredient started giving me hot flashes. I strongly recommend that you do not waist your $ on this product. I threw it in the trash half way through. Try making your own. Ingredients on YouTube =)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good for weight gain and muscle mass.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier in a professional amazon packaging. What I like about this product is the taste of it, any flavor are pretty good with just a mix of water. It has good amount of protein and amino acids., also has creatine mixed. I been on this brand for 3 yrs because it did helped me gain weight and mass and also you can't bit the price on this. All the other Weight gainers are ridiculously over price. I hope that this brand will continue to deliver and not over price.
customer_reviews.author: OneShot

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for gaining weight! It’s always been my struggle. I would drink this before bed so I wouldn’t burn the calories as fast while sleeping and it was very effective with helping me gain weight. I was a 22 year old girl 5’9 and only weighed 105 lbs last year, very underweight! Drinking these chocolate shakes at night plus milk, plus peanut butter I gained 15 pounds fast!! Almost at 130 lbs. now :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many different protein powders and shakes and they all usually have a funky taste. The Chocolate Peanut Butter tastes amazing! I blend with low fat milk a couple tbsp of peanut butter and ice. Quick easy breakfast if you literally only have 1-2 minutes before rushing put the door. I just ordered the Strawberry and am looking forward to getting it this aftetnoon.They have so many great flavor options. I highly recommend for someone just trying to put on weight or for a post workout shake to help get the gains. You have to put the work in to see results!
customer_reviews.author: Nenita Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate mixes so much better than vanilla.
customer_reviews.text: Best gainer for the price! Chocolate mixes well but vanilla does NOT! Vanilla is also way too sweet! This gives me huge gut bloats after I drink it, so you need you eat your meals BEFORE having your gainer shake. Almost look pregnant lol That said, it definitely works to pack some pounds on. I went through 24 lbs of this stuff in 4 months and managed to gain 15 pounds of pretty solid muscle with LOTS of work in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: NOT STRAWBERRY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THE STRAWBERRY. It tasted so bad I had to give it to a friend, and I am not in the habit of throwing away $40.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Buck Flavor is Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I don't ever use the full 2 scoop recommendation but i'm a skinny guy and for gaining mass this stuff is amazing. This is my 3rd bag and I will keep ordering it. I actually just started a subscription! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: TOO SWEET😷
customer_reviews.text: I can't hate on this product for not working. I'm sure it's would put on mass, but I couldn't bare the taste of it. Even a half serving is way too sweet, even with 16oz water. Don't buy it!! Go with my protein shake: 1 cup milk(raw goats milk*), 1/3 cup coconut milk, 4 raw eggs, 1/4 cup nuts, 3tbs chia seeds, 2tbs peanut butter, 1 frozen banana, 1/4 cup frozen blueberries or strawberries, handful frozen powergreens(spinach)!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: So today I received the package and wow it was huge lol, I was excepting it to be a smaller container but it seems to be pretty big, definitely work the 34 dollars. Anyways I got this since I have an hourglass figure and I’m currently 5’5, 111 pounds. I have an extremely fast matabolism that causes me to not gain weight at all at times. So in a month I’ll review it again, and tell you what has happened. So far the chocolate flavor amazing! Taste like birthday cake lol. Also it hasn’t made me bloated so far, I feel pretty good, made my back hurt though. Anyways hopefully I gain weight!
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Just started...will update
customer_reviews.text: I just started. But i can say that it does make me feel “funny” i don’t know what it is. Anxious, rapid heart rate and slight headaches I don’t know. Maybe it’s in my head The scoop is huge, and it takes two, i also don’t image this container lasting very long. And the taste isn’t bad. I bought the chocolate one. But it didn’t come fully filled maybe 3/4 full. But it did come sealed. I plan to finish out as much of it as i can, but after this i can’t say I’m going to continue using it. Hopefully I’ll actually gain some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ayschell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Awful unless you enjoy sugary protein shakes that taste like liquid candy. I have been using Serious Mass for years and decided to try this flavor out since it was cheaper. Horrible. 20 grams of sugar per a serving. Honestly I don’t think I can stomach this bag so I may end up just tossing it. Extremely disappointed. I guess that’s why the banana flavor is like 10-15 dollars cheaper. However if you love 30-40 grams of sugar in each protein shake, I’d stay away from this flavor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mass gainer I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to put on weight since I have a very fast metabolism. The shake is great after a workout and has a filling effect. If you eat properly and combine that with an exercise program you can put on good muscle mass with this product. I was drinking 2 shakes a day and gained roughly 5 lbs of lean mass over a month. As is in the title, it should supplement your regular eating and not replace regular food. Start off with half the recommended serving and work your way up so you dont waste any of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: decent chocolate taste - real results
customer_reviews.text: if you can hold three or four of these shakes at half recommended dosage a day along with increased dietary intake and heavy physical / workout regime for four months, get ready to put on 40+ pounds of pure muscle - watched my 25 year old firefighter son go from 123 lbs to 169 lbs in that length of time - just one anecdotal example, not a medical promise...
customer_reviews.author: schlitz

customer_reviews.title: Not the best way to gain weight..
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for gaining weight if you're a really skinny guy, but beyond that you're mostly going to be gaining fat. I went through about 2 1/2 of the 12 pound bags, going from 145 lbs at 6'3" to 185 lbs. I started to realize I was gaining quite a bit of fat around my midsection and decided to stop using this product. Take a look at the ingredients and you'll find the main ingredient is Maltodextrin, which will promote fat storage. I wouldn't recommend this product unless you're really skinny like I was and want to quickly gain some extra weight.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Unhealthy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to gain weight. I'm 5'7 and about 125. I blended one scoop of this with soy milk bananas, blueberries and strawberries, I got vanilla. The taste was pretty good. However the main ingredient maltodextrin is horrible, read up on it, and that is why I cannot use this anymore. It totally made me bloated and look like I have a kangaroo pouch and I'm a guy. This was instantly after I made each smoothie with this. Also, stomach had minor uncomfortable cramps. Because of this I cannot recommend. I will be using natural grass fed whey protein and use natural alternatives for calories. This stuff is bad for you.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I have already purchased this product and I still love it. It has really helped me with my weight and I am so happy about it. I am still working on my goal, but I will still continue to use this product because I do believe it has helped me. I ordered the vanilla flavor, only because I am personally not a fan of chocolate flavored protein powder, but it’s all personal preference. I use the vanilla protein powder with milk, or almond milk (you’re preference) I add peanut butter, almond butter, and a banana.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The serious mass is great overall
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the serious mass protein power for about as long as I’ve been working out. I’ve tried the vanilla and the chocolate flavors. I’m not sure if there are other flavors but the vanilla and the chocolate are great. Personal, my favorite one is the vanilla. Every time I order it, it always come on time. The package is always neat. This protein powder works, but you have to put works in the gym too, otherwise, you won’t see any results.
customer_reviews.author: Gershon Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Results May Vary
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this as I’m sitting on the toilet for the 10th time. I’m sure it doesn’t happen to everyone because this has great reviews and ON is usually a great brand from my years of experience with them but this mass gainer has my stomach messed up. Between gas & diarrhea, I’m having a very hard time with this. Just putting this information out there. Maybe someone with a sensitive stomach will heed my warning.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Archer

customer_reviews.title: Consume atleast 3 times daily
customer_reviews.text: What I like is the fact that it has a great nutritional value and the flavor is addictive, my personal preference is the vanilla , but it's not all about the flavor for me, it's more of the results part I care about,the only thing I dislike is that even though the price is fair, that there should be more servings , other wise I think it's worth every penny,I have had optimum results
customer_reviews.author: Andrew c brown

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This stuff didn't seem to work for me. I don't know if I was using it wrong but I ended up buy from celucore after I finished this stuff. This protein tasted like crap even with milk and I practically gagged it down. Then again It didn't work for me and i'm no body building expert just got this as a recommendation form a friend. Didn't end up working so I bought another product that I love now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a few months now and I'm definitely seeing progress in my lifts and noticing the mass show. It contains some great supplements needed to support a body that’s worked, but also contains a lot of carbohydrates. Be mindful of not overdoing it. I don't always have time to make my own weight gainer (oats, protein, egg whites, peanut butter, etc) so it's always great to be able to just throw a loaded scoop and some water or milk into a blender bottle and head out. Would seriously recommend this to anybody looking to gain some muscle or support a high calorie diet.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Works great for gaining weight
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely hard time gaining weight. I got down to 104 pounds while trying multipul other protein shakes. After one month of drinking this along with my normal food intake (3 meals a day, 10 hours fasting) I was able to get up to 110 pounds. I cant do the whole amount at once so i do half in the morning and half at night before bed. 12 oz milk and one scoop each time. Aiming for 135 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Summer Rose

customer_reviews.title: protein shakes don't always make you gain weight I lost it
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed about this stuff I am desperately trying to gain weight so I started drinking this after a while I figured out I was actually losing weight from drinking it the instructions were that adequate either I thought you only had to use one scoop but it turned out you had to use more than that and even when you blend it up in a blender it has a certain thickness taste to it even when adding ice cream or other things to it that still tasted not so great.
customer_reviews.author: jeffSoLo

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my weight from dropping, perfect with choc milk
customer_reviews.text: These stuff is so good. My weight fluctuates I am 5”4 and 123 to 130 pounds and I try to stick with 130 trying to get to 135 so I try to drink this with milk. It says on it to mix it with water, but I mix it with chocolate milk, bananas and cinnamon and it goes really well together!!! It keeps my weight from dropping constantly as well. The vanilla taste is perfect too, i was scared it was going to be gritty or wayyy to vanilla-y but it was just perfect for me, not gritty and perfect taste of vanilla. :))) I am going to try it with strawberries and white milk sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Ceara Bell

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, lots of calories!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got cancer November 2018 and passed February 2019. During that time, I lost 15 pounds taking care of her. After her death I had to do something to gain weight back. This did the trick. One thing in particular I like about it is that it is not heavy or thick. Just eat like you normally do and add one or two glasses of this to your diet and you will start putting the pounds back on.
customer_reviews.author: Christian in Florida

customer_reviews.title: ¡¡¡ READ MY REVIEW !!!
customer_reviews.text: BE VERY CAREFUL with the amount you put on your shake (NEVER A FULL SCOOP IS TOO MUCH) the scoop is very big. IT WON’T BLEND VERY WELL if you add too much to your shake. ¡¡¡ TAKE THIS IN CONSIDERATION !!! (MAKE SURE) You Drink a Lot of WATER if not you will get a lot of Pimples [TOO MUCH CALORIES IN THIS PROTEIN] . (EXERCISE) Don’t take this Protein to get FAT because it will show a NEGATIVE RESULT IN YOUR BODY (Belly Grow)...
customer_reviews.author: Wilmi Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Back to Boost
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t swallow the taste. And I broke out bad on my face after I started drinking this. Has a bad after taste. And the scoops required to get full calories are huge. Ended up throwing it away. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF WHATEVER YOU BELIEVE IN, DO NOT GET STRAWBERRY
customer_reviews.text: As for the results, they're there! I gained 3 pounds in just three days. Originally, I wanted to write a review after one month of taking this, but I just couldn't wait to tell you to NOT GET STRAWBERRY. I love fruit and fruity flavors; I'm not much of a thick chocolatey or vanilla person, so I thought strawberry would be great. BUT IT'S NOT. When I drink it, I have to pinch my nose and down this so fast, then eat a flavorful candy that masks the taste of the strawberry mass gainer lol.
customer_reviews.author: Krystel Joy Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. For sure will gain weight
customer_reviews.text: Ive had the chocolate one and now this cookies and cream one and i gotta say the taste is great! The chocolate one was like drinking some hot chocolate and now this cookies and cream one reminds me of the smoothie at chic fil a. This product really does help you gain weight also ive gained about 7lbs from the 6lbs powder and im excited to see how much ill gain from this one. I would suggest working out while drinking this product. Also if you are using this as a meal replacement then you probably wont see as big of a change as u would if u were eating regularly and drinking this also.
customer_reviews.author: robin winston

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for 4 days so I can't really comment on any progress yet. I've tried a lot of different protein powders and have been disappointed. I don't like the taste of most of them. This one (chocolate flavor) is delicious. I blend 2 scoops with some almond milk, bananas, peanut butter and some ice cubes and it is SO delicious. It's very filling. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Would be great for bulking/ hard gainers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a meal replacement in case of food shortage during the COVID19 pandemic. The taste by itself is not great. I like to blend it with a banana and peanut butter. Makes it a little more tolerable. If im not bulking, it is too many calories to take on a regular basis. I got this on sale but not sure I would pay full price for it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I don’t write reviews...but
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews, but I feel these sorts of products always advertise and never deliver. So I’m writing this to save you from feeling lost, or unsure. High calorie is very important for weight gain. This item I do highly recommended. Great post workout shake. Lots of calories, does the trick. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Bad, All Sugar, Threw it Away
customer_reviews.text: I ended up throwing it away. I thought that I might get used to the taste, but after three attempts, I decided it was not worth it. It also had way too much sugar in it for me. Worst Optimum Nutrition product I have tried, but that is based purely on my preference and taste. I do like their creatine and protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband drinks this daily to help him bulk up and gain some weight. He has been drinking it for about 6 months and has been slowing gaining weight. It’s a great product for people who have difficulty gaining weight. The only complaint I have is that the price seems to fluctuate from 30 to 50 dollars every month... which is strange. Other than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: julia erastov

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, great feeling!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to add extra calories to my daily intake because I want to gain weight. This is the best tasting protein powder I've gotten so far. It tastes just like vanilla, and i mix it with lactaid and i don't have any stomach aches after as i have had in the past with other brands. I've already started gaining weight and it makes me feel full until I am able to have a full meal. I love it! I plan to buy again and buy double next time!
customer_reviews.author: Big Momma

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I'm mad! I would return the unused product, but it will cost too much to send it back, as this is a heavy bag. Now, I'm out $47 and can't use it! I specifically checked to see if this product contains sucralose. The label on Amazon does not show sucralose as an ingredient. However, the product mailed to us does. I cannot have sucralose, as it causes a bad reaction. So, if you actually have a protein powder without artificial sweeteners, let me know. I'm still looking to buy protein powder, but not this!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C

customer_reviews.title: Sugar.
customer_reviews.text: It's just ... sugar. Not healthy in the slightest. You're being lied to by yet another supplement company. I used this for a solid 8 months. Saw 0 improvements, always gave me a sudden sugar rush that led to me crashing, made me break out, and stole my money.
customer_reviews.author: VoidofSalads

customer_reviews.title: Did as claimed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few weeks now and it did do what it said. I'm 5 feet 9 inches and I was weighting165. Now I weigh 180. Unbeknownst to me you are aupposed to consume 3500 calories a day taking this stuff. Unfortunately my bank account will let me consume that much food. Note please that half of those calories CAN NOT come from coffee alone. I had to stop taking because I was experiencing lightheadedness and dizzy spells.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best protein shake there is
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this protein for years now. It is by far the best tasting weight gaining shake there is (chocolate with milk, never water). The preferred serving size is a bit much so I usually do just under that. With a regular sized shaker cup I pour the milk to the rim then shake as much as possible to get the powder to rise from the bottom. Then I place in the freezer for about 20 minutes. Then, I open the mouth port of the cup and fill the rest of the cup up with milk till you can’t anymore. Place in the freezer for 10 more minutes then you have a perfectly done shake.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with goodies
customer_reviews.text: Started out with only one scoop as recommended but got diarrhea. My doctor said this product was probably too rich or potent for me so I stopped using it. After several days my body returned to normal and started using the product again but only in very small quantities I really wanted the calories and protein this product offered. Maybe I can work my way up ?
customer_reviews.author: easy critic

customer_reviews.title: Avoid product if you have constitution issues
customer_reviews.text: Not a feasible product for weight gain for people dealing with constipation problems. I opened the product, made up one dose which called for 1 full cup of the mix. That’s ridiculous. It soon coagulated and became so thick I couldn’t drink it. There’s no way my system could process that solution. I threw the rest away. I was also blown away when I read that the gallon of powder was supposed to be only 8 doses. That’s way to expensive even if I had been able to consume it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene g.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to everyone wjen they ask me about weight ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it for a year. Throughout the year, I gained 65 pounds! I worked out every day and drank this every day. Granted, I was also consuming 8-10k calories a day (with the help of this product) but it still helped me get the extra calories with the protein I needed! The weight gain messed up my knee a little bit but my body adjusted over time. Started out 5'10 at 135 amd ended 200 a year later. I did later drop my weight down to 185. I recommend this to everyone wjen they ask me about weight gain.
customer_reviews.author: Keifer Grubb

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 servings in 6 lbs!
customer_reviews.text: If the protein and calorie count sound too good to be true, it's because they are. The "serving size" to achieve that is two giant scoops, and the 6 lbs container only holds 8 servings. So even if you cut the servings in half, you make it half a month. There are plenty of supplements out there that'll get you there for a lot less. Really disgusted by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Esjael

customer_reviews.title: REQUIREMENT FOR HEALTH & BULKING UP!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 8 months with amazing results! I went from 215lbs to 245lbs in that time. Similar products costing anywhere from $80.00 - $120.00 was the only way to get natural results until I purchased your product. Flavors are great, never upsets my stomach, best product at an even better price! I share with everyone at my gym who also have become customers of yours. When i go pro in a year, I'm taking Optimal Nutrition with me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Read

customer_reviews.title: so good...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fairly regular gym user for several years now. I have increased in strength but my weight has decreased, particularly as my cardio has increased this year.The chocolate flavour is really tasty. At first the taste had to grow on me but I really like it now. I suspect with more use over the next few months I will see further gains. I take one scoop every morning and one before bed as part of my daily routine. So far so good and would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Nuwan sampath

customer_reviews.title: It depends on the person
customer_reviews.text: Honest opinion for someone who’s skinny and looking to gain weight plus muscle.. i can’t say it won’t help you gain weight but keep in mind that if you have a hard time drinking something that is thick like a milkshake and a lot of it at one time then I wouldn’t even bother. The vanilla flavor taste just as expected but it is really thick when using almond milk. I’m not sure if this was supposed to be something you drink throughout the day or at one time after a workout but just know that regardless it is hard to take down. It’s almost like drinking a big bowl of melted ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amiar

customer_reviews.title: The flavor has changed! (not for the better)
customer_reviews.text: This used to be one of my favorite proteins of all time, but last time I noticed the flavor was different. A few days later I read the bag and saw that they increased the creatine to 3g and I'm starting to think that this change has completely ruined the amazing shake we used to drink. While I appreciate the increase in creatine, I can't help but think that it may be the culprit in this change of flavor and it makes me sad to think my favorite drink may be gone forever.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Good thing I’m a clean freak so I check for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but beware, I just got to the bottom of the bag and i found a couple dead maggot looking bugs at the bottom! I feel sick knowing I almost drank those things. Good thing I’m a clean freak so I check for these things! I actually really enjoyed the product but I’m too scared to order more at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Relic

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein shake.
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried 3 or 4 different kinds in my life but the Vanilla Flavor has always been one I enjoyed. A lot of the protein powders typically have an aftertaste but this one I genuinely feel I could just drink to drink. The packaging is perfect, as well. The zip up feature is high quality and there's no leakage or anything. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Total waste of money. No gain, just bloating and feeling unmotivated. I couldn’t even stomach the full two scoop serving size. I would feel terrible every time I had this stuff, but I kept trying. I eventually finished the bag on principle. The only positive thing is it doesn’t taste bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like heaven
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it one day so I can’t say, yet, how this product is in the gaining weight department but I can say that this is the best tasting protein powder I have ever tried and if I see results this will be the only product I will ever use. You can still tell it is a protein powder (duh, you’re not going to get away from that) but it’s not strong or over powering, it doesn’t have an after taste, and it really does taste like chocolate milk without being too sweet. With milk it’s almost like a milkshake and with water it’s like watered down chocolate milk. So far I’m extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Talk about super mass!
customer_reviews.text: I've gained almost 9 lbs since taking this product, bringing my weight up to 164. I've sat between 153 and 155 most of my life, never being able to get above the 159 mark. Taking this mass builder, along with a serious push up, pull up, and free weight regime have gotten me into the best physical shape I've ever been in.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Labeling low protien per serving
customer_reviews.text: This huge 6 lb can of powder only has 8 servings as broken down on the label. Super high sugar, sodium and carb content vs protein. Better off with a high protein, low carb alternative. Shop around.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: Protein powders usually don't taste good, which is fine, but this power simply tastes awful (I bought the chocolate flavor). I have to throw the whole thing away after the first try because you can't return products like this once they're opened. I just wasted $46 and learned my lesson: read the one-star reviews always.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will never stop ordering this product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying the serious mass for a long time. The only thing about the serious mass is if you’re not working out as much as you should, then there’s no point of buying it because you won’t be seeing much results. You have to make sure you eat, rest and workout while taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gershon Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Probably works but eh..makes me feel sick
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I saw a few other reviews with people claiming that it made them feel a little sick and kinda disregarded it because I've taken protein before but nothing like serious mass. Idk about this stuff, it probably works but its only been about a week and already this stuff makes me feel pretty sick/shaky when I drink barely half a scoop mixed with milk. I'd stick with something else with better ingredients like genius protein..never had this reaction from protien before.
customer_reviews.author: Tabuu Baptiste

customer_reviews.title: Big serving size, additive sugar but good flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to see the serving size of the protein powder, it is 336 gms/serving which is lot relative to other proteins. The 50g protein comes from this big serving scoop, if scaled down to other protein powders, the relative size of others will hold more protein content. The sugar content feels little disturbing, need to drink more water. Overall just fine, if regulated to manageable size of serving. Banana flavor goes good with milk, not as much with water.
customer_reviews.author: Sandesh

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy...
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of calories. Directions say two scoops per 24oz of water/milk. "Scoops" is a gross understatement. It's actually a half cup! Two heaping scoops + 24 oz of milk = over a quart of THICK LUMPY "meal in a blender". Tough to get all that down in a sitting... Flavor isn't bad, (basic vanilla) if you can get past the foamy thickness. Still, for $45, there are are more horrible ways to add weight...
customer_reviews.author: Dad Bear

customer_reviews.title: No Good Cookies & Cream
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 12 lb bag because I thought that the cookies and cream flavor would be delicious. I put 1 scoop, mixed and drank, and then 2 scoops, mixed and drank. And the flavor is really disgusting. I’m not satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm FAT!
customer_reviews.text: I gained so much mass! Bought this when I was 20 pounds underweight. After working out for a couple years and drinking this chocolate bag of carbs every day I can proudly say that I finally fit in with the rest of America.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

product_meta.title: Optimum Nutrition Serious Mass Weight Gainer Protein Powder, Vitamin C, Zinc and Vitamin D for Immune Support, Chocolate, 12 Pound (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate| Size:12 PoundSerious Mass is the ultimate in weight gain formulas. With 1,250 calories per serving and 50 grams of protein for muscle recovery support, this instantized powder makes the ideal post-workout and between meals shake for sizing up your goals. Serious Mass provides you with the tools you need to pack on the pounds and help you develop the physique you’ve always wanted.
feature_bullets: Vitamin C, Zinc and Vitamin D Provide Immune Support along with Vitamin E
Packaging may vary - New look, with the same trusted Quality!
High Calorie Weight Gainer: 1,250 Calories per 2-Scoop Serving
50 Grams of Protein per Serving for fueling Intense Workouts
Over 250 Grams of Carbohydrates per Serving
Using an Electric Blender to Add Fresh or Frozen Fruits, Peanut Butter, Nuts & Other Calorie Dense Foods to Boost Your Weight Gain Potential
Search "ON Apparel True Strength" to see our new ON clothing line

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
